positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: ‚Ä¢Part of the 23 - member Core Team which is responsible for Publicity, Sponsorship and Event Management‚Ä¢Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 17 Campus Representatives responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020‚Ä¢Penned down write-ups that were published on various social media platforms, website and souvenir of Kshitij‚Ä¢Approached eLearning Platforms and Publishers to have them as Knowledge Partner in Kshitij 2020‚Ä¢Coordinated with the team members to conduct Robotics Workshop and Guest Lecture in ML and AI in Kolkata with a participation of over 800 students
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
‚Ä¢Part of the 23 - member Core Team which is responsible for Publicity, Sponsorship and Event Management
‚Ä¢Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates and 17 Campus Representatives responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020
‚Ä¢Penned down write-ups that were published on various social media platforms, website and souvenir of Kshitij
‚Ä¢Approached eLearning Platforms and Publishers to have them as Knowledge Partner in Kshitij 2020
‚Ä¢Coordinated with the team members to conduct Robotics Workshop and Guest Lecture in ML and AI in Kolkata with a participation of over 800 students

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: ‚Ä¢Part of the 40 - member Team which is responsible for the publicity of the fest and final execution of all its events‚Ä¢Assisted the participants in explaining them the events and helping them with their robots at the time of the event‚Ä¢Managed event Embetronix and Laws of Motion with allotted Core Organising Team Member‚Ä¢Publisized the fest in the regions of Kolkata, Bhubaneshwar and Visakhapatnam
positions.title: Kshitij Campus Affiliate
positions.description_html:
‚Ä¢Part of the 40 - member Team which is responsible for the publicity of the fest and final execution of all its events
‚Ä¢Assisted the participants in explaining them the events and helping them with their robots at the time of the event
‚Ä¢Managed event Embetronix and Laws of Motion with allotted Core Organising Team Member
‚Ä¢Publisized the fest in the regions of Kolkata, Bhubaneshwar and Visakhapatnam
